name: Valentines Away
description: You are surrounded by a loving landscape. The only hateful thing within miles is the grumpy, old, antagonist, that is the player. Valentines Day is approaching and you decide that you can't handle this much love any longer. You rise from your hole and you try to find a way to escape from your tragic life. (Sorry for making it downloadable instead of play in browser, I was having issues!) (Left and right arrow keys to walk well, left and right and space to jump)
